## libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```


## Data

```{r}
mags <- read_csv(here("finalproject", "data", "CDI_Samples_Akkermansia_MAGs.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()

seq16s <- read_csv(here("finalproject", "data", "CDI_Samples_Akkermansia_16S.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(sample_id = taxon,
         amuc16s = akkermansia_ra_16s,
         am_i, am_ii, am_iii, am_iv,
         # dna_conc = as.numeric(dna_concentration), 
         x8)
```


```{r}
glimpse(mags)
glimpse(seq16s)
```

```{r}
both <- full_join(seq16s, mags)
```
